title: Water is the key
creator_credit: Tasmanian State Film Unit, Don Anderson and Rodney Musch
brief_description: Shows the many uses to which water, Tasmania’s greatest natural resource, is put, including generation of hydro-electric power, irrigation, and industrial and domestic consumption.
creator_credit_for_label: Tasmanian State Film Unit, Don Anderson and Rodney Musch
